name: Generic Jam Game With Horrible Art
name_original: Generic Jam Game With Horrible Art
description:
Walk around and kill people, but be careful, being found out means death. Reason? Who needs one, the developer isn't that creative. This is just a slow, relaxing game. There is no need to add in lore, dialogue, quests, etc.. An important number to note is 40. Keeping track of other people is a nice thing to do.

Controls:
[w][a][s][d] - movement
[spacebar] - punch
[esc] - toggle menu
